title: Account banned for 14 days for leveling too fast in 3v3 Co-OP vs AI?
body:
Myself and a few others basically zoomed through 1-30 by buying the stacking XP boosts and playing 7-8 minute co-op vs AI games. 

We played for a pretty significant stretch of time because we just wanted to hit 30 ASAP.

One of the players is a streamer who streamed the leveling process, and if you check the co-op vs AI chat logs, you'll see myself and the other two people having discussions, laughing, etc. 

We made tickets about a day and a half ago and have not gotten a reply yet. 

Is there anyway to resolve this? We wanted to play during the weekend but we've heard this has taken people weeks to get resolved.

replies.body: Hey there Brien v2. [WookieeCookie](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/FVvpqT4F-perm-banned-after-two-days-playing?comment=0003) was working on bot detection and it may have swept up some people like this incorrectly. Please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll remove it _if that was the case_.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KqtlG46J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-06T11:31:06.622+0000)
>
> Hey there Brien v2. [WookieeCookie](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/FVvpqT4F-perm-banned-after-two-days-playing?comment=0003) was working on bot detection and it may have swept up some people like this incorrectly. Please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll remove it _if that was the case_.

Aha I gor perma banned just because I played 3vs3 till 30
Classic form of unskilled players, yet you need how many champions to even to think of heading into ranked as well as runes
We are all smurfs, one being a top 20 challenger, myself being D3.

NAH UH MAN UR UNSKILLED FOR HITTING 30 HUR DUR


Hope they resolve this and give you your account back. Glad to know Riot's banning people for "botting" with exp boost but not banning actual bot accounts.

The system seems a little odd.

That being said, I do not know what triggers it. 

Maybe time played in a short time frame, xp gained in a short time, etc.

Either way, the ban is only 14 days. Even if I was a legitimate botter, isn't a 14 day ban pretty light instead of just perma banning the botters?

Maybe it's just easier to ban a significant base of the players and resolve the outliers through tickets rather than have a 100% accurate system. 

Their post in the other thread mentioned finding a way to detect it before the "damage has been done", or the accounts have been sold is my guess. Maybe they are just going super strict to discourage botters on the short term.

I met a bot account that was purchased. The account went from playing free week champs in ARAM/co-op vs AI to suddenly playing Azir in ranked only. No normal 5v5s. I reported it and Riot said it wasn't a bot account. 10/10
seems legit.

Day 5, no ticket response. 

At this pace, the 14 day ban will be over by the time Riot actually responds to the ticket.

If it was a mistake as a result of the bot detection experiment and you've already submitted a support ticket, then it will get resolved. It may take a bit to get a response because they are backed up due to the number of impacted players.
Spend money on Xp Boosts and efficiently farm. Get punished by Riot for hitting 30 too fast.

Actually did you keep suiciding in game or something? because there are bots in 3 v 3 treeline your acc might have been mistaken as a bot, these bots actually keep feeding there in order to be carried by team mates

We didn't suicide, but we also didn't stomp the games either.

We only killed the bots if they were basically running into us or in between towers, so sometimes the bots would get cheesy kills on us(if we tank tower shots in order to get the tower kill or the overleveled top lane bots rotate to their base to stop the game from ending. )
